articles.description: Apple has announced that MacOS Tahoe will be the last version to support Intel-based Macs. Here's what you need to know.

articles.title: Study explores whether female odor-based mating preferences could predict gamete-level compatibility
articles.description: Published in Heredity, a recent study led by the University of Eastern Finland explored sexual selection in humans by investigating whether female odour-based mating preferences could predict how compatible male and female gametes are.

articles.title: Study reveals 15 hidden genetic risk factors for celiac disease
articles.description: This comprehensive GWAS reveals 15 new genetic variants linked to celiac disease, offering insights for earlier detection and tailored treatment strategies.

articles.title: We've Finally Reached the End of the Road for Intel Macs
articles.description: MacOS Tahoe will be the final version of macOS to support some specific Intel-based Macs.

articles.description: While people have long valued smartphones for their power, convenience and usability, they’ve also expected a mobile device that blends versatility with portability. articles.title: With iOS 26, Apple finally makes your iPhone's Photos app usable again
articles.description: iOS 18's Photos app was a pain to use and Apple is fixing it with the latest iOS 26 update.
